name: BDSM Sex - Episode 4
description:
A visual novel series about a young woman exploring the world of BDSM. In this episode, her Master introduces a surprise – a female dominatrix, who will be joining them in their session.

GAME DESCRIPTION

In episode four, Katy surprisingly finds her Master in the company of a sexy dominatrix named Sam.
At first, Katy is visibly intimidated and unsure of what to expect.
But as the women get to know each other better, Katy feels a growing attraction towards Sam.
The Master follows their interaction with lust and is delighted by his submissive’s surrender.
Follow the story and find out what else the two doms have prepared for her.
We promise a story with arousing dialogue, realistic-looking characters, and high-definition graphics.

FEATURES

- HD renders and animations
- Video and image gallery
